channel.title: How can I make a certain interface pop up when i click on something?
channel.description: okay firstly if this is in wrong section please move if you want (mods) im sorry i just dont really know what section it would belong in... i dont go on the private hacking place much but anyway I want to make an interface load for when you are somewhere and you can walk with it up like godwars killcount in rs anyone know how to?

if(object == imblack){ showInterface(nigger); }
